title: Filo shepherd's pie
ingredients: ['500g lean boneless lamb (such as leg), trimmed of excess fat and cut into 2cm cubes', '2½ tbsp flour', '2½ tbsp vegetable oil', '250g shallots, peeled and left whole', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '4 carrots, peeled and thickly sliced', '1 celery stick, sliced', '125ml red wine', '350ml lamb or vegetable stock', '1 tbsp Worcestershire sauce', '1 tbsp wholegrain mustard', '1 bouquet garni', '2 leeks, halved lengthways and thickly sliced', '2 tbsp chopped fresh parsley', '3 sheets filo pastry, about 135g in total']
